page.title: 04Holwell Parish Council
page.content: Established in 1894,Holwell Parish Council has seven members,elected every four years,one of whom is elected Chairman annually,and a part time paid clerk.There are four meetings a year unless extra ones are called for urgent matters. A period is always set aside for the public to join in the discussion.{Planning {applications}are talked over, to advise the District Council.Other matters discussed are{traffic and {roads,footpaths,drainage}and other topics of local interest.The council is funded through the rates at a cost of slightly less than 1p in a Â£.By membership of the Dorset Association of Parish Councils,contact is maintained with the National Association and other Councils.
